entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who is familiar with Filch and his cat Mrs Norris. He also seems to have a good relationship with Ron's brother Charlie.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as the person in charge of Mrs Norris, who follows Hagrid everywhere he goes.

entities.name: snape

entities.name: ron

entities.description: Charlie is Ron's brother who works with dragons.

entities.name: mrs norris

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as a dog that Hagrid would like to introduce Mrs Norris to.

entities.name: gringotts

relationships.description: Hagrid seems to have a good relationship with Filch, as he mentions that Filch puts Mrs Norris up to following him everywhere.
Hagrid is friends with Ron and has a good relationship with his brother Charlie.
Snape seems to dislike Harry, as Hagrid tells him not to worry about it.
